explanation: Majority of opinions indicate strong bullish sentiment for BTC with expectations of a move to 108,800â112,000 and beyond. Several community members mention holding or entering long positions, citing BTC dominance, bullish chart structures (cup & handle, bull flag, ATH potential), and macro factors (liquidity, QE, rate cuts) supporting upward movement. Traders warn shorting is risky, and some are waiting for pullbacks to enter or add to long positions. Few negative or neutral opinions present, and most short trades are being closed or discouraged.
